CodeBreaker7 - Class in <Unnamed>

countClues - Static variable in class CodeBreaker7
 
countCurrTurn - Static variable in class CodeBreaker7
 
createCode(String, int) - Static method in class CodeBreaker7
Returns an array of some length containing randomly generated characters (representing colours), from a String of colours and an integer representing the amount of colours to generate.

D

displayGame(String[][], String[][]) - Static method in class CodeBreaker7
Returns a string beginning with headers, followed by 16 '*', followed by the guess, followed by the clues up to the turn in which the user is on.

F

findColourCorrect(String[], String[]) - Static method in class CodeBreaker7
Returns an array containing a "w" for every String in the user input that has the same value as the String in the code but different position.
findFullyCorrect(String[], String[]) - Static method in class CodeBreaker7
Returns an array containing a "b" for every correctly positioned colour in the guess.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class CodeBreaker7
 

R

remCode - Static variable in class CodeBreaker7
 
removeFullyCorrect(String[], String[]) - Static method in class CodeBreaker7
Returns an array that is the result of removing every correctly positioned colour in the user input, and adding the colours that were not removed to a new array

S

SIZE - Static variable in class CodeBreaker7

TRIES - Static variable in class CodeBreaker7
 

V

valid(String[], String, int) - Static method in class CodeBreaker7
Returns true if guess is valid (correct size and valid colours entered) or false if guess is invalid.
